Class MalmoObservationSpaceGrid

    public class MalmoObservationSpaceGrid

    Observation space that contains a grid of Minecraft blocks

    • Constructor Detail

      • MalmoObservationSpaceGrid

        public MalmoObservationSpaceGrid(java.lang.String name,
                                 int xSize,
                                 int ySize,
                                 int zSize,
                                 java.lang.Object... blocks)
        Construct observation space from a array of blocks policy should distinguish between.
        Parameters:
        name - Name given to Grid element in mission specification
        xSize - total x size of grid
        ySize - total y size of grid
        zSize - total z size of grid
        blocks - Array of block names to distinguish between. Supports combination of individual strings and/or arrays of strings to map multiple block types to a single observation value. If not specified, it will dynamically map block names to integers - however, because these will be mapped as they are seen, different missions may have different mappings!
